description:
Inflating bounds for rotation should support min/max progress

These values were previously assumed to be 0 and 1 (the parameters were ignored).

R=ajuma@chromium.org
BUG=None

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=228238

messages.text:
lgtm with a couple nits

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operation.cc
File cc/animation/transform_operation.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operation.cc#newcode289
cc/animation/transform_operation.cc:289: SkMScalarToFloat(BlendSkMScalars(from_angle, to_angle, max_progress));
Consider moving the "if (min > max)" check (currently done after conversion to radians) to here, so that min_degrees and max_degrees really do mean min and max.

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc
File cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc#newcode1011
cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc:1011: { 0.25f, 0.75f },
Also include cases where min_progress < 0 and max_progress > 1.

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operation.cc
File cc/animation/transform_operation.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operation.cc#newcode289
cc/animation/transform_operation.cc:289: SkMScalarToFloat(BlendSkMScalars(from_angle, to_angle, max_progress));
On 2013/10/11 13:18:17, ajuma wrote:
> Consider moving the "if (min > max)" check (currently done after conversion to
> radians) to here, so that min_degrees and max_degrees really do mean min and
> max.

Done.

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc
File cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/26869008/diff/1/cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc#newcode1011
cc/animation/transform_operations_unittest.cc:1011: { 0.25f, 0.75f },
On 2013/10/11 13:18:17, ajuma wrote:
> Also include cases where min_progress < 0 and max_progress > 1.

Done.

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/vollick@chromium.org/26869008/12001
Committed patchset #2 manually as r228238 (presubmit successful).

subject: Inflating bounds for rotation should support min/max progress
